title: Mixtape: Antwon – In Dark Denim
body:
Continuing the trend of Valentines Day releases, rapper Antwon has just dropped his latest mixtape.

 _In Dark Denim _sees the San Jose barsmith (I’m going to do everything I can to make “barsmith” a ‘thing’) displaying the same kind of form that made last year’s _End Of Earth _such a vital release.

Beats are contributed by a variety of artists, including Cities Aviv and B L A C K I E, while Goldfrapp are sampled on the title track, which has more than a whiff of Death Grips about it. You can download the mixtape [here](http://www.mediafire.com/?vhu0p0cfbwe5rr8).
